page.title: 11BECKLEY SCHOOL
page.content: Children attend Beckley Primary School from the villages of Beckley, Elsfield, Forest Hill, Horton-cum-Studley and Stanton St.John. A few children also come from the Bayswater Road, between Bayswater and the White House. In 1985 there were 92 taught in three classes. There are three full-time teachers including the headmaster, Mr.John Amor, two part-time teachers, a secretary, a classroom assistant, a caretaker, a cook, an assistant cook and 3 dinner- time supervisors. The children travel to school by coach, mini-bus, car, bicycle or foot. The school is situated next to the village church and is a Church of England (Controlled) School.
